fields.text: Thank you for calling SmartBiz Loans in San Francisco, your partner for SBA loans from one hundred fifty to three hundred fifty thousand dollars at competitive rates.
To prequalify online for a six point two five to seven point two five percent SBA loan ranging from one fifty to three fifty thousand dollars, press [INDEX].
To check your existing prequalification status, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve your prequalification details. A representative will be with you shortly.
To start a new loan application, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our online application team.
To speak with a loan specialist, press [INDEX].
For questions about loan terms and rates, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a specialist for terms and rate information.
For support with an existing application, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our application support team.
